name: SANTA: Master of Shadows
description:
Christmas as begun... once again

Santa is back.

But this time, people are aware of his presence.

But santa have more than one trick in his hod.

!Game In French Only!

Controls

(Q) - (D) Movement

(Shift) Sprint

(Spacebar) Jump

(Z) - (S) Climb a ladder

(Tab) Show gift card

(E) Pick Up / Drop

(F) Shadow

Rules

You got to deliver each present to a particular house. Each gift require a particular attention while carrying it.

The informations of the Gifts are shown on the Gift Card (Tab).

You can avoid being seen buy becoming a shadow (F).

You have 3 minutes to deliver a maximum of gifts. If you get caught or time runs out, it's Game Over.
